website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and reliable "card" table that makes extra seating for parties a breeze.
pros: Sturdy locking mechanism to keep the legs locked when in use
Extra support bars on the leg add to the solid feel of this inexpensive table
Thin top makes it easy to store
Nice hard surface works well for many applications
cons: This table is not as easy to take down as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: ... clearance under/around the top of the legs is really good. Most other tables have cross braces that interfere ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table because the top is a hard surface (not padded) and the clearance under/around the top of the legs is really good. Most other tables have cross braces that interfere with sitting at the table. It arrived quickly, in great shape, and just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed that it arrived damaged. There was a scratch on the surface and a dent along one edge. The legs are scuffed. There was no damage to the packing, so this had to be the condition it was shipped in. The table itself it heavier and more wobbly than expected and the legs are hard to get up and down. A spray with WD40 has helped that some.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo18

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I've had card tables in the past & they always had the vinyl top & they'd get snagged, torn or stained & I'd have to replace the table. Not with this table. I love the resin top. Makes for easy cleaning after family gatherings. The legs open together which is another plus. Super sturdy when you have a house full of kiddos all the time! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't have a high expectation of this table for the price so I was quite amazed at the quality when it came. I especially love the surface. Not soft or padded like some card tables so great for crafts and puzzle building...basically everything.
customer_reviews.author: PennyLQ4

customer_reviews.title: Easily marked/scratched...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Cosco 34" Resin Top Folding Table (Black) instead of the vinyl top one, thinking it wouldn't get marked up or torn like the vinyl would. Well, I guess it won't get torn, but it's already marked up like crazy, and we've only had it a short while. It seems almost anything you sit on it will scratch the surface if it slides around at all. I wanted a nice, clean, look -- now I will have to cover it with a tablecloth to prevent further damage. Not what I hoped for, at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Functionable, good quality, easy to stow away
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small studio apartment and needed a table that would function as a study table, but be easily stowed away when not in use. This product fits the bill. It's amazing how a sizable table like this can be quickly and efficiently folded up and put away; when I'm not using it, I just stow it next to my couch. It is perfectly function able and fits the description. It doesn't have the look and quality of a cheap plastic table, and it well worth it for the price. Another reason to love COSCO!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this as a temporary table for my small living room space, but it's so easy to fold and move around, I placed in my bedroom for a few days, and haven't moved it since! It's so convenient, I use it as a table to type on my laptop in my bedroom, and as a handy space for placing my business papers that I'm working on. It's got plenty of room , and I still can move it wherever I want, I love my table!
customer_reviews.author: D. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy table! Love it! easy to set up, a little difficult to fold up but they are pretty much all like that I think. (Added a picture)
customer_reviews.author: ltlbrt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, poor quality. Don’t even bother buying one.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality table, legs are not even, the surface is curvy and useless product. If you want to buy air for $35 dollars, then this is the product for you. I don’t like giving bad reviews but this is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Ismail

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to lower legs!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sturdy table. I plan to use it for working jigsaw puzzles. The problem is the difficulty folding and unfolding the legs. It is almost impossible for me to put the legs down. I had planned to have a table I could easily store in the closet when I wasn't using it but there is nothing easy about this table. It would be best for someone who plans to leave it set up all the time. I may have to try to find a more usable table.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table
customer_reviews.text: This square table is absolutely perfect! It arrived fast and in excellent condition. Superb quality! Thanks! Very, very sturdy. Very easy to unfold legs. This table has a nice smooth, hard, firm top which was perfect for our use. We used it as a side table for a meal celebration, it held a lot of food and even held serving crock pots. Then later we used it as a table to play board games. I highly recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: Swimfunwaves

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Construction
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this table. Don't expect to put any weight on it because its surface is only supported by a thin layer of Masonite. The table edges are surrounded by a poorly fitted piece of rubber/plastic. I suspect it will fall apart if it is exposed to high levels of humidity for any length of time or gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Awkward and difficult to open & close
customer_reviews.text: The table a nice surface and a little larger than most card tables. But, I found it very difficult to open and close the legs. Because two legs are attached to each other and do not move independently, you have to push on 2 legs at one time. It is very difficult to do so while standing up. I end up laying the table face down on the floor in order to be able to push the 2 legs at the same time. Awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Tribefan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Legs are sturdy but hard to fold down to store.  Perhaps just me...
customer_reviews.text: It always amazes me at the variety regarding reviews! I’m giving this table 2 stars because of its sturdy legs. The rest is a a zero. The vinyl top had some nicks on one edge but box didn’t seem damaged. My biggest complaint has to do with the folding of the legs to put this table away. Two legs fold at one time. You have to have some strong arms to fold this table. I’m an elderly lady who just wanted a table for puzzles. My shoulders feel strained after folding this table. Not a table for weak arms. Or, for most women in general! Im not returning it, though. Too much hassle. Thank goodness the price was reasonable...
customer_reviews.author: Ruth E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for Bunco or Bridge
customer_reviews.text: It's a card table, what can I say? I do like the resin top. Less likely to mar it like the old school vinyl covered tables. Also having two legs fold together at one time makes set up and take down a little easier than the tables with four separate legs.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin'

customer_reviews.title: I can't get the legs to fold up
customer_reviews.text: I love this table BUT...... It is sturdy and the right size, but I can't figure out how to get the legs to fold. I'm in my 50's and not weak, nor am I stupid. I've had folding tables all my life--worn several of them out. It should not be so hard to fold the legs up. It takes all my strength to push in on the sides so that I can't push the legs down after pushing in. I have come back here only to see if there is some trick to it. Having read the answers here, I'm going to give it another try. Maybe laying it on it's side will help. I'll try to let you know.
customer_reviews.author: insanityreigns

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for nice looking foldable table and chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for a good price. This table is 34" x 34", a bit larger than my ideal table for my space of 30" x 30", but otherwise I was very happy with it. The top is not vinyl, which is nice since it won't tear or rip, as I've seen on my vinyl top card tables over time. Chairs are cushioned and nice. A great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great table, ours came with large scratch though.
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 stars but table came with large scratch across top of table even though the box had no damage to it at all. Must have happened before it was boxed up. Table is study and convenient. Just sad it came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: purpleaholic

customer_reviews.title: An All-purpose table.
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy and looks nice in my living room where I sort all kinds of stuff. This would be a nice gift for newlyweds, folks who deal crafting, as an extra table when company comes for supper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cosco NON-FOLDING Table
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Does not fold once opened. I live by myself and cannot fold it. What's the point if you can't easily set it up and break it down? In order to return this useless product, I will have to recruit two people. It will take three of us to work simultaneously because the pins in each pair of legs require multiple hands to simultaneously press the pins to fold the legs otherwise they cannot fold. Page has a video of multi-unit family happily using product. Probably because it takes that many people to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: Boston reader

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed !
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be in perfect condition. My only complaint is that it is a mite stiff to close, but it is new. It seems that it will be perfect for what I need it for and I do have a place where I can keep it set up. Hopefully they will let me say "Thank you" for getting it here so quickly !
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, well-made card table!
customer_reviews.text: this is a very well made, sturdy card table. the reason i bought this is because i wanted to have a foldable table for when i clean out my fridge and freezer. i don't have to keep going back and forth to the counter. i just set this up right next to fridge. i really load it up too with no worries about it collapsing. i've seen some cheap card tables but THIS is not one of them.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to fold, but since I don't have a need to move it often I'm giving it a good review overall. Sturdy and easy to clean, especially after big projects or messy snacks. Would recommend to anyone as it's also perfect for game night!
customer_reviews.author: Mason Grey

customer_reviews.title: Surprised, it looks really good.
customer_reviews.text: We use a folding table as a kids table when our children and their families visit. This one has a smooth top. No padding to tear. Plenty of room for little swinging feet, yet sturdy. Easy to clean then store. Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought so my wife and I could play cards. All the flat surfaces in our condo were full of -------stuff. We now can play any time we want but sad to say it has become a flat surface and is becoming a surface full of -------------stuff. It is well made and I found the exact same thing at an outlet store for about$5 cheaper. All in all good buy as delivered very quickiy and I did not have to go out in rain. I found it easy to fold and unfold if you hold the legs properly.
customer_reviews.author: WARM WILLY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty legit standard table. Holds my and my friend's 43874234234 liquor bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy top (black vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Bought the black top. Used one time (500 piece puzzle). Did not lean on it, but by the time I was done noticed that the center had sunk about 1/2 inch. The top was very flimsy. Good news is that if I want to to use it for other projects such as round things (ball point pens, X-acto knives, small screws, ect.) they will not roll off. They will end up in the center of the table. Bottom line . . . I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schoenig

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I wanted, however, it arrived to me with a huge gouge in the corner of the top of the table. I am frustrated that I have to package this back up to send it back when the whole purpose was to have it delivered to my house so that I did not have to cart it around town in my car. Not terribly happy 😠
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: A functional table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to seat 3 kids next to the dining room table. For this purpose this table worked well. Sufficiently sturdy without worrying that the table would collapse with an 8, 6, 4 year old. What i didn't like was the difficulty locking the 2-at a time legs in place and the relative difficulty closing the legs after use. That said it's a safe purchase for what i needed at the price i was willing to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Stan S

customer_reviews.title: Decent Table for the Money
customer_reviews.text: While there are certainly more expensive better built tables out there, if all you want is an affordable small table for games or crafts this is your best buy. We bought this table so my Semi-Invalid Auntie could have a place to work on her beloved puzzles. She loves it and when she isn't working on puzzles we can easily fold the tables legs and tuck it neatly away.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy..
customer_reviews.text: First of all I got it damaged and second I understand resin to be a form of plastic. It's corrugated board coated and attached to a light weight metal frame.. Not happy..
customer_reviews.author: aunt pookie

customer_reviews.title: COSCO 34" Card Tables
customer_reviews.text: The COSCO tables look nice, and seem very sturdy. The problem is the legs. They are hard to put down and take back up. Because you are manipulating two legs at one time instead of one, they are stiffer, and you have to have the table on the side where the coupled legs are. In order to manipulate them at all, we had to oil them when we first got them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & works in my living room as a table while watching TV.
customer_reviews.text: Love all COSCO products. When ordering chairs, the seats are 16 inch now, no longer 18" Ordered chairs from Amazon, advertised with 18 inch seats, but when they came they were 16 inch. Amazon was fantastic. Put the box outside, UPS arrived with the label. Wow! If you want chairs for a tall person over 150 lbs. order OVERSIZE. I found them at home depot on line.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Z

customer_reviews.title: Slightly cheap feeling, but not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and decently priced card table. A bit cardboard feeling, and the corners have a stained look to them. I’ll try to remember to take a picture next time I use it. I wouldn’t trust much weight leaning on it, but sturdy enough for a card table.
customer_reviews.author: MyLuv115

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandmother, who wanted a table that can be set up/taken down for jigsaw puzzles. I set it up for her and it seems solid and sturdy. The top is firm (hard plastic) and that was hard to find in a folding table. The only trouble is that the legs are a little hard for her arthritic hands to pull out and push down. It has to be done with quite a bit of force. It would be better if there were a release mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole in WI

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I figured this table might be a long shot - but I love the hard top and the two pairs of legs that fold out (instead of 4 individual legs). Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Fears My Music

customer_reviews.title: Steer Clear of this Table
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in a pretty battered box. We only discovered the crack in the side of the top the following day. The top is made of cardboard and certainly doesn't offer confidence in its ability to withstand any weight over a very few pounds. Would return it but would cost too much in shipping. Will have to order a different, better made table.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Iden

customer_reviews.title: Product as per expected. No issue.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the play tent table cover. They were used items and as per described. They looked new and in good conditions besides some scratched on the side which was expected as the used items. They are sturdy so far but I will handle them with care because of some reviews shows that it was filmsy.
customer_reviews.author: hc

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: We needed a simple replacement square folding "Card Table" for game nights. After checking the larger local brick and mortar stores and not finding a simple folding table we turned to Amazon. This table was exactly what we were looking for. Vinyl covered, square, and folding with no seams on the playing surface. Even the legs fold as a pair on each side and is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: survivor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I have a somewhat heavy portable grill on it outside. I will be bringing it in after summer as the under part of it looks like cardboard but it’s good for the price
customer_reviews.author: KTrout

customer_reviews.title: Durable hard top
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. I wanted one where the top would not get marred or peel. This hard top is very durable very attractive the table is very sturdy. When it folds down you have to hold it certain ways otherwise it's stiff to fold but that's okay as once opened it will never fail.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Graulus

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is basically fine, but the legs are VERY difficult to fold up. My 5-year-old tried to do it himself and ended up bending one of the legs so that one pair of them no longer fit flush against the underside of the table when they're folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small apartment.
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for my needs. I live in a small apartment and often need a flat surface for stuff like board games or folding laundry. However, there's no room for us to have a nice table all the time. This folding table is perfect because we can set it up, do what we want to do, then put it away when it's time to do something else! Lightweight and easy to carry from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Page

customer_reviews.title: Good height and large surface area
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy, of a good height for adults, and easy to set up and take down. I have only one concern about the table top. It is padded and covered with faux leather and I worry about putting a hot dish or bowl on it. I am afraid a really hot pan would burn or scare the top. Other than that it is a great table.
customer_reviews.author: pacificshepherdess

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: When I received it it came a little damaged. The tables is really hard to make the legs go down you have to have strength to push the buttons to make it go down. I got this as a game, puzzle, crafts table. It sets up easy it's not too heavy it wipes down nicely. For the price it's not too bad. The only thing I would change is to make the button easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: The vinyl top is excellent for card games or dominoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four tables for our card-playing group. They are exactly as expected. This item is sturdier than the kind where the legs unfold separately - the bar between each pair of legs adds stability to the table. The vinyl top is excellent for card games or dominoes. All arrived in good condition, shipped timely!
customer_reviews.author: suzimer

customer_reviews.title: Need strong hands to unfold this
customer_reviews.text: Table itself is fine, but getting the legs to unfold requires a good amount of strength. Doesn't release easily to fold up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...
customer_reviews.text: This table worked out well for extra seating at Christmas. The only issue is that we left it in the rain overnight one time and it developed a huge bubble in the middle and is no longer usable. Kind of a bummer....
customer_reviews.author: Liza Ewings

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my buddy after he lent me his, says this table is better than what he lent me. Sturdy is the key word. Folds easy. Nice resin top. Used for a few family gatherings. One satisfied friend. This is reviewed 6mos. later. He recommends!
customer_reviews.author: sushiray00

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table it is just what I needed! Perfect size and can be folded up and put away when I'm not using it. Although I use it so much I hardly fold it up and put it away. I do computer work on it at times, we play games and do puzzles on it too, and sometimes we even eat on it. It's a nice table to have! I rate it with 5 stars, and I recommend it too! I'm very pleased with this purchase! :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Elliott

customer_reviews.title: NICE table!
customer_reviews.text: This table is GREAT! I am in a w/c so I have to be able to handle putting it up and down. It's sturdy yet lite wt. I am so glad I got this. Highly recommended not only for quality but price as well.
customer_reviews.author: pepperhorseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect When Extra Space is Needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when extra table space is needed or for small projects. Sturdy and stores easily. A little hard to open and close, the mechanism is stiff and difficult to "click" to close. It may loosen over time and with repeated use. Not a big deal for me - I call my husband, but if you have weakness in your hands, like arthritis, this might be difficult. I'm pleased with it and have used it many times to create extra seating during dinner parties and for small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Luvs 2 Cook

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold back!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered 1 day late. Corner of box torn. One leg scraped. Decided to keep because returning such a bulky item would be a hassle. Sturdy enough but don’t get it wet! Need two people to fold legs back in because latches are so stiff. Serves its purpose as a card table. Cheap; you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Ssimr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this expecting a very cheap and somewhat flimsy table, but it far exceeded my expectations. I just wanted a cheap table for puzzles and am very pleased. Great for crafts or anything else you may need a small table for (like puzzles)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table for those extra holiday guests, cards, board games, or laptops. It’s sturdy but heavy for me. I’m 64, 5’ 2” with weak hands. So it probably is just me. The video showing how to fold it was a bit to unrealistic for average people. It was very difficult to fold. Otherwise a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Kline

customer_reviews.title: Useful, great price, top material may wear
customer_reviews.text: Great price, light enough to use often and fold up. I use it to organize messy areas of may house. I put out the card table, take all items in the messy area and put them on the table, then one b one decide which things to keep and which things to give away. The material on top can be tear fairly easily but for my purposes that doesn't matter. If you use it a lot, maybe use a table cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Deal

customer_reviews.title: simple and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Actually purchased this table last minute to set up a virtual learning area for my son. All of the legs touch the floor. A little tough to open and close but not a huge issue. Easy clean up. Definitely not very sturdy either. It serves its purpose for the price so overall I am satisfied with it. Estimated delivery varied but end up receiving it pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: britt

customer_reviews.title: Check out your product and make note of return date.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 10 tables. 9 of them were good but one had a ripped top and legs were wobbly. Unfortunately, this was the one that we didn't take out of the box until recently and discovered it was damaged. Apparently, there is nothing we can do about it so be sure to check all the tables you order.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: The table is nice looking. The top is black vinyl, slightly padded. The legs are very solid and sturdy. You have to push hard on the outer edge to fold the legs down. The price was reasonable and I have Prime so the shipping was free. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: DianeD

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for putting together puzzles. It’s fine for the price but pretty light weight if needed for playing games, cards etc. but again it’s a nice table for the money and easy to fold up and down and lightweight enough to easily put it away!
customer_reviews.author: Donovan1

customer_reviews.title: The legs are very stiff, and the surface is ...
customer_reviews.text: The legs are very stiff, and the surface is hard plastic rather than the plastic-covered felt you might get on other card tables.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley May

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great table. We don't have the kitchen space so we bought this for playing games and doing puzzles and when we are not using it I fold it up and put it under my bed. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: katcon

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to close. But great to use
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to close. I took a file to soften the catches so it would slide better. But the button you have to press is extremely hard to get it to move. Bad with arthritis. But once open, great to use. Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ninfa

customer_reviews.title: Hard to close!!
customer_reviews.text: The table looks good and seems sturdy enough for the price. The BIG issue is closing the table. Very, very difficult to press on the hinges to close this table. Sometimes it takes two people. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: cherylk

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it to be sturdier and easier to fold. I can fold it by myself, but it is easier with 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Very good value.
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive table is just that. The value is solid but don’t expect it to stand up to hard usage. The only minus is the way it opens. Two legs are connected rather than four individual legs and that makes opening and closing a bit tricky. The table is a good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Calling it mediocre might be a little generous
customer_reviews.text: It's a card table that's obviously not meant for much more than a card or board game. The top is just thin vinyl over what's basically cardboard. Mine actually came with a tear in the cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton Binkley

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a card table. Only reason it didn’t get 5 stars for sturdiness was because during a couple of games it almost tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Teles

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality card table
customer_reviews.text: The table is black and sleek looking, light and easy to fold up and carry and I can fit a 1000 puzzle on it easily.
customer_reviews.author: atteacher1

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to do nails on. I would recommend this table. We use it inside for very lightweight items. No issues so far. There was 1 corner that was "off" a bit but no1 would notice if they weren't looking for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H

customer_reviews.title: Product Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I did not return this item because of the effort to get that done. Difficult to open. The seams of the table top are not seamless but uneven. I don’t like writing negative reviews, but if you need an outdoor table go ahead but for something else look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: David Clemetson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is good about this table is the size. F...ed up quality, breaks after the first use. Had to add glue to all edges from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son & daughter-in-law as a gift and they love it! It is easy to take up and down---no finger pinching--and sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Past Romance

customer_reviews.title: Great card table
customer_reviews.text: The person that glued the top on did not line it up correctly, but for the price it is no big deal. I bought this table to go with four chairs that I use for my grandkids to eat at in order to keep them from ruining my good fabric chairs. A little hard to fold and unfold, but that is probably going to become easier after a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Mel45

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good table at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This was one of many tables I purchased for my son's graduation. It held up great. We put it through the ringers for sure. Easy and fast setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product as long as the aesthetics is not an issue for the buyer.
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time. Seems sturdy enough for my purposes, which is to use it as a study desk. Packaging had no damage. However all 4 legs have damage. The legs are supposed to be round but each of them, and 1 side of the bars that hold the top of the table, has, a portion where it seems like something squashed them and make it flat. This caused the coating (or painting) on them to come loose as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aquatris

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: It's a generic folding table. Sets up quickly and is stable, but won't hold a lot of weight. Okay for casual use but not good for temporary tables that might need to hold something with a lot of weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Basic, sturdy table for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The legs are a bit stuff to open and close, but overall pleased with the product and price. Sturdy, easy to clean and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for an extra space
customer_reviews.text: We use this to set up in our parking lot to screen our patients. It is sturdy, easy to carry and has done fine in all kinds of weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sue123

customer_reviews.title: Extra table space!
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this table to wrap Christmas presents in our home office (the place where all presents for the kids are staged before Santa comes). It is nice quality at good price. Worked perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy lifting!
customer_reviews.text: A good table for light items. Don't plan on using this for anything heavy. It is very foldable and convenient but for me I needed something a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Toddler

customer_reviews.title: Cosco always has great items
customer_reviews.text: Love the smooth surface top, legs fold up only. Great for games or dining Very well made, Cosco items always are!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda H.

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty, lower your expectation then you will be happy
customer_reviews.text: It is a $35 fordable table, shipped to your doorstep. Don't set your expectation too high. It concave slightly after I put my 24 in monitor on top of it. Top material is soft and edge is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kylinblue

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an extra table I can put up in my bedroom for my computer etc when I am on call all noc. Then I can store when done.
customer_reviews.author: openheart

customer_reviews.title: Great table: Best price
customer_reviews.text: I love this sturdy table. I use it for a desk because it's strong and deep enough to hold my very large desktop computer at a comfortable distance.
customer_reviews.author: G.Glee

customer_reviews.title: CAME DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: one leg didn't even touch the floor Table was warped table was scratched on top top was coming apart on one side
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bushor

customer_reviews.title: COSCO 34” table was a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Undesirable hard top, difficult to close legs because it is necessary to always do two at one time. I would never buy another one like this.
customer_reviews.author: Lonna A Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Legs Seem Harder to Get Down
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but legs are so hard to get down. You have to use your both hands to hear the click to make the legs go down. Just annoying but other than that it’s a good quality table.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie'Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really nice table for the price and much nicer than expected. Easy to put up and fold down and seems pretty sturdy. I purchased the black table which has a black vinyl top. It was packaged well and arrived in perfect condition even though the box was a bit damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. DiPaulo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy card table. Heavier than I thought it would be but it will probably last a long time. A little difficult to get the legs up and down with just one person. The brace in the middle of the table will probably keep the table from sagging as many of them do.
customer_reviews.author: RVH

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and size of this table. This table is flimsy and not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Beadwizard

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy table. Seems like it's durable, time will tell. We used it to set up a wrapping station for xmas, build some Lego models, and put together a puzzle. Worked great for all three.
customer_reviews.author: patrick A. Lozeau

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good table for the money. We like the smooth finish on the top. We would have given it 5 stars but there is a quarter inch nick on the table top edge. (That's what permanent markers are for, ha!) It's also difficult to get the legs folded back down. Hoping this will get easier after using awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as promised
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is reasonably sturdy for a card table.
customer_reviews.author: pmf

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tables
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Strong. Takes a knack to open and close but once figured out it becomes simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Damaged, but useable
customer_reviews.text: Item came with minor damage just like the other reviews, but only using it for my son to paint and build miniatures on, so not worth sending it back. Otherwise it will serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: A Handy Table With Many Uses
customer_reviews.text: This table serves many uses. It is lightweight and easily moved and stored.
customer_reviews.author: little old lady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Great in size, easy to open, not too heavy, but extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Alan B. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold up
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't fold the ends in to flatten out the table. Very hard to hold the table while at the same time trying to clamp the ends together to flatten the table. The springs weren't flexible enough for most people to close especially older people ! Wouldn't recommend unless the person is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The resin top is backed by poster board that is screwed to the side.....have not used it yet, will see how it holds up at Christmas. If it fails, will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann1

product_meta.title: Cosco 34" Resin Top Folding Table Black Black
product_meta.description: Size:1-Pack| Style:Resin| Color:BlackUnfold some fun with a versatile table designed for indoor or light outdoor use. This table is stylish, strong and easy to clean. This versatile piece saves space and time with table legs that fold in to make for easy storage. Its 34" square size offers comfortable seating for four. This table has a heavy duty steel frame and steel legs.
feature_bullets: Resin Top: Low maintenance and easy to clean, allowing for indoor and light outdoor use
Lightweight: Easy to move and store
Folds Flat: Folds up tight and compact for easy storage
Non-Marring Leg Tips: Protects floor surfaces
Steel Powder Coated Frame: Strong and durable for many uses

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,002 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
